name: Birb (daidiimon)
description:
Story: 

Man wants to fly. Decides to kill the sun to prove that he can fly. By yeeting himself off of birbs. 

Controls:

NAVIGATE THE MENU: WASD to select option, SPACE to select.

PLAY THE GAME: W and D move left and right, SPACE to jump/double jump in the air, Left Click to grapple/yeet.

Art Assets not by Austin:

Bird Sprites: https://www.trzcacak.rs/imgb/hJRwxhT/
Muscle Man Pic: http://clipart-library.com/muscle-man-cliparts.html
Sun Pic: http://www.clker.com/clipart-sun-sole.html

Music:

Running in the 90s by Maurizio De Jorio
Mega Man X - Epilogue-The Transient Silence ~ENDING STAGE~
